meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Craig Moysey Sally Wright Chris Wonderly Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7086.

td.p: Craig Moysey, a business specialist originally from Brockville, Ontario, Canada
Sally Wright, an antiques dealer from Los Angeles, California
Chris Wonderly, a visual information specialist originally from Kansas City, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,900)

tr.td: HEALTH-RELATED ORGANIZATIONS
THE CENTURY OF THE CRIME
"EA" NON-SPORTS
HEAVY
METAL
SOFT ROCK

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Sally: The Heart As--what is the Heart Association?)
(Alex: Mm. Give me a little more.)

the American Heart Association

Sally
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
